org.metacsp.utility

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.metacsp.utility.Matrix

  • public final class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    A bare-bones immutable data type for M-by-N matrices.
    Author:
    Robert Sedgewick and Kevin Wayne (Princeton University, Dept. of Computer Science)
